typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_c0} as string,
		H as string,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Customer_ID as string,
		Open_Date as string,
		Last_Consulted_Date as string,
		Vaccination_ID as string,
		Dr_Name as string,
		State as string,
		Country as string,
		DOB as integer,
		Is_Active as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		Name as string,
		Customer_I as string,
		Open_Dt as date,
		Consul_Dt as date,
		VAC_ID as string,
		DR_Name as string,
		State as string,
		Country as string,
		DOB as date,
		FLAG as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Name = Customer_Name,
		Customer_I = Customer_ID,
		Open_Dt = Open_Date,
		Consul_Dt = Last_Consulted_Date,
		VAC_ID = Vaccination_ID,
		DR_Name = Dr_Name,
		State,
		Country,
		DOB,
		FLAG = Is_Active
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
